name: Desktop Zoom
description:
Scroll to zoom gnome desktop.
Hold alt and scroll to zoom.
Cursor must not be over a window (must be over background or top bar).
Magnifier / zoom must be enabled in accessibility.
To disable zoom after removing the extension, disable zoom in gnomes accessibility settings:
https://help.gnome.org/users/gnome-help/stable/a11y-mag.html.en
